TopicTitle: Kerbal:The Docking Kard Game "The Wanderings Of Jeb"

Articles.Content:
This kind of started out as a joke the other day. MY friend Pollux posted a KSP Magic The Gathering card in our facebook group. I replied with one I made a long time ago. Next thing you know we have more than 40 Kards and This has spread to Multiple KSP Facebook Communities.

This is now a Huge Community Project and I've been asked to post it here.

We need your help, go to

http://www.mtgcardmaker.com

Make your own Kard and post it below or you can post suggestions for Kards below.

Be creative and show some humor.

Check out What we've done so far....

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Edited October 6, 2015 by greydragon70

Looks amazing

ive seen it on FB group too

Oh wow. You actually used that picture I made of Valentina created from a pic of an EVA Kerbal and the Squad PR image.

Yeah, that pic of Val was a prank I played on Squad and the community a while back. I always giggle when someone actually uses it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111236-Valentina-Kerman?p=1799575&viewfull=1#post1799575

https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2zwceo/leaked_dev_shot_of_valentina_kerman_on_eva/
